TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {87098=You can top up while being abroad, in the following ways: 1. Call 1253 free of charge and follow the instructions. 2. Send an SMS to 1252 with the text: “�” (space) and the 12-digit number of the top-up card you bought before you left Greece on vacation, or someone else in Greece has bought for you. To use this service, you must have enough credit to send an international SMS.   3. Call +30 6944 40 1254 from your or any other mobile phone and follow the instructions. To use this service, you must have enough credit for the international call., 64934=You can switch between plans by calling 1266 free of charge. textBeforeTable: You can switch your connection for free from:   You can switch between plans by calling 1266 free of charge. You are allowed to make one change per month. Can I switch my number from one prepaid plan to another? Follow us on Facebook Find a store Send us an email Get more help No Yes Was it helpful? There is a network identification service. You can send the mobile number you are interested in via free sms to 1292.  You will receive a reply sms informing you about the network the number belongs to. How can I find out if a number is Vodafone? Follow us on Facebook Find a store Send us an email
textAfterTable: Was it helpful? Yes No Get more help Send us an email Find a store Follow us on Facebook How can I top up another person's connection? To top up another Vodafone prepaid connection, you can purchase a Vodafone scratch card, call 1254  free of charge (from any Vodafone number) and follow the easy pre-recorded instructions to top up.
